Congressman tries a comeback Politics Video: Ronald Reagan Centennial: 1980 GOP Acceptance Speech Report Abuse So what else is Mr. Donald Rumsfeld going to say? That it was all a mistake and we should never have gone in? Of course, not. His world-view and sense of self are too long held to ever admit that the invasion of Iraq was a mistake and should never have been launched. And I doubt Mr. Donald Rumsfeld will live long enough to reflect and recant his blunders as Mr. McNamara was brave enough to do.
